# Kestra

ORCHESTRATION

Kestra is an open-source orchestration and scheduling platform designed to automate complex data workflows. It provides a user-friendly interface for managing tasks, real-time monitoring, and error handling, making it easier to streamline data operations. Kestra supports a wide range of plugins, enabling seamless integration with various data systems and tools.

## Kestra + MotherDuck

Kestra integrates with MotherDuck by leveraging its flexible plugin system to connect with the cloud data warehouse capabilities of MotherDuck. This integration allows users to orchestrate and manage data workflows that involve querying and processing data stored in MotherDuck, utilizing DuckDB's efficient analytics database engine to optimize performance.
